title: Remote Works: Exploring the New World of Work
description: Citrix has created a virtual series filled with research, tools, and best practices to guide, support, and enable the flexible workforce.
author: podcast@citrix.com (Citrix)
content:encoded: Citrix has created a virtual series filled with research, tools, and best practices to guide, support, and enable the flexible workforce.
itunes:title: Remote Works: Exploring the New World of Work
itunes:author: Citrix
itunes:summary: Work has changed forever. We’re back with seven  episodes filled with human stories and expert advice. From the evolving business of Major League Baseball to the employees who are moving further from the office, we dive deep into the strategies and technology that will help companies and employees thrive in the new world of flexible work.
itunes:subtitle: Work has changed forever. We’re back with seven  episodes filled with human stories and expert advice.
